attributes.action: Introduce a plastic tax to encourage companies to use biodegradable alternatives
attributes.additional_details: Plastic is destroying our planet and ruining our oceans. A tax on plastic packaging will make using plastic a more expensive option that used environmentally friendly alternatives.
attributes.background: There are many environmentally friendly, biodegradable packaging solutions which can be used as an alternative to plastic. Yet most companies will never switch to these whilst plastic remains the cheaper option. Only when it's cheaper to be sustainable will companies initiate change.
